name: Laser Beans
description:
Made for the Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam! Developers have one week to make a game from scratch to fit the theme: Stronger Together.

W and D to move. Shift to run. Space to jump. Ctrl to change beans.

Disclaimer: This isn't a finished product. There isn't any sound because I didn't have time to add any. Gameplay is also very short, but more is to come in the future. This is a project I will continue to work on.
